title: [Minecraft.net][CULTURE]LUNATIQUE的宇航员
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2017-3-7 21:27 编辑 


LUNATIQUE’S ASTRONAUTLUNATIQUE的宇航员
Go above and beyond with this stellar skin用这个恒星的皮肤去任意翱翔吧！
We’ve been keeping an eye on Lunatique’s skins for a while - lots of good ideas, interesting colour choices and inventive use of the armour layers make them really stick out from the crowd.
我们已经关注Lunatique的皮肤有一段时间了——许多好方法，有趣的颜色选择和盔甲层的创造性运用，使它们从皮肤之中脱颖而出。

This Futuristic Astronaut is one of my favourites - particularly the glass bowl of the helmet. It’s really impressive to take a game as blocky as Minecraft and make a texture that gives such a strong impression of being spherical. But enough of my wittering - what does Mojang’s Master of Pixelart, Johan Aronsson, think of the design?
这个未来宇航员是我最喜欢的皮肤之一——特别是头盔上的玻璃罩。把Minecraft里的方块通过使用一个材质将其变成一个球形，真的很令人印象深刻。但我的写作水平有限，那么，Mojang的首席像素设计师，Johan Aronsson，对这个设计是怎么看的呢？

It's always great to see things like this coming out of the community. The combination of well crafted pixel art, smart use of the two layers available and a knack for how to combine colours that you wouldn't usually think can go together makes Luna's creations a joy to gape at!
JOHAN ARONSSON看到这些来自玩家社区的东西总是很棒。精心制作的像素艺术，巧妙的运用双层而且还有搭配颜色的诀窍，你可能不会想到，它们结合到一起可能会使Luna的作品令你目瞪口呆！
JOHAN ARONSSON
You can get the skin by clicking below! (It'll probably open in your browser and have a funny long name - we're still tweaking our website's file download feature. But you'll cope! I believe in you!)
你可以通过点击下面的按钮获得皮肤！ （它可能会在您的浏览器中打开，并有一个有趣的长名称 - 我们仍在调整我们网站的文件下载功能，但你会应付的！我相信你！）

（右击选择 链接另存为 即可）

原作：Marsh Davies 发布于 2016年11月30日
翻译：@WuGuangYao
